content.question: In the fourth paragraph, the author discusses diseases in wild salmon primarily to

choices.label: highlight similarities between the incidence of disease in wild salmon and farmed salmon
imply that wild salmon are more susceptible to disease than farmed salmon
support a claim about the health benefits of eating farmed salmon
present evidence that calls into question the benefits of large-scale aquaculture

content.answer: present evidence that calls into question the benefits of large-scale aquaculture

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
